mdRecord.dcterms:description: This black and white photograph shows one person holding a piece of paper so that the surrounding five people can see it. There is a handwritten note in the lower margin: "Sweepstake 6/7/47." The back of the photograph has several handwritten notes: "Sweepstake June 1, 1947" and "Clarence won 2nd place in Irish Sweepstakes, c. $47,000" and other notes.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sweepstake (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wood, Clarence M.
African Americans -- Portraits
Sweepstakes
